divs: Sighting Details My family and me were out side in my back yard I was grilling my family dinner and while I was out there I was looking at the sky because I liked to look at the beauty of the sun starting to set and that day there was clouds. then I see what I thought was a bird because it looked to be about a couple hundred feet like a hawk or volture. then I noticed that it was moving like a plane and then it looked to be a couple thousand feet but then it stoped and did not move for a fue seconds. when it stoped i felt like something was loking at me or I was not alone. then it shot up over the clouds and disapiered and not like it went into a flash of light but just disapiered I told my family what I saw but they thought I just saw a plane so I thought about it for a second and just left it alone for almost a year but something just in the back of my mined just new that something was not right about what I saw then I was channel surfing and found out about this website on the History channel
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around August 21st 2006
Summary: plane like or bird shape with silver surface
